boardgame.name: Mamma Mia!
Мамма мия!
マンマミーア！
媽媽咪呀！
맘마미아
boardgame.description: Designer Uwe Rosenberg has a talent for dreaming up new and inventive card games, and Mamma Mia! is a perfect example of this talent, with players placing pizza ingredients into a combined pool, then trying to time their pizza baking in order to make use of what's available in the kitchen._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player starts the game with eight different pizza orders to fill, with one of those order cards in hand; each player also starts with a hand of ingredient cards (showing pepperoni, mushroom, pineapple, green pepper or olive). On a turn, a player lays down one or more ingredient cards of a single type into a common stack, then optionally adds a pizza order card to that stack. He then refills his hand by drawing as many cards as he played from either the shared ingredient deck or his own order deck._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After the draw pile is exhausted, the shared pile of cards is flipped over and sorted by ingredients until an order comes up. If enough ingredient cards are available to fill that order, the owner scores it; if not, the player can make up the difference by playing cards from his hand (and thereby scoring the order) or else return the card to the bottom of his order deck._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once all the orders are scored or returned, shuffle the ingredients used in pizzas and start another round of play. After three complete rounds, the player who's filled the most orders wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2000 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee

RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.
If you buy multiple items from me I can combine them to reduce shipping costs. I only charge the actual shipping costs.

Rio Grande Games (RIO 115) Number of players: 2-4 Age of players: 10+ Length: 30 minutes Game Description: Mamma Mia! what a pizza! Each player has eight similar orders they want to fill during the game. On each turn, a player adds ingredients to a common supply and and may add one of their orders to the stack if they think it can be filled from the ingredient s already in the stack. A good memory will help, but other players may have a few tricks (and ingredients) up their sleeves to wreck your plans. When the draw stack is empty, Mamma Mia! sorts the ingredients and fills orders from the sorted i ngredients --- with possible help from the players. Once used, ingredients are gone, so players must watch carefully or find their orders unfilled. Fill the most of your eight orders to win the game!

A terrific card game of pizza making that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s something of a classic.
